Title: Paradiso: Seven Days with Seven Women
Actors: Hanns Zischler, Cora Frost, Adriana Altaras, Irm Hermann
Plot: On the occasion of his 60th birthday, Adam organizes an extended celebration at his country home. In addition to his current wife and their young children, the guests are his previous wives, the few most important of his former lovers, and the son he has not seen in decades with his family.
